title: Apple.MainStage.3.0.3.MacOsX
description:

Description :


MainStage 3 lets you take your Mac to the stage with a full-screen interface optimized for live performance, flexible hardware control, and a massive collection of plug-ins and sounds that are fully compatible with Logic Pro X.

The Ultimate Live Rig

ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ Combine instruments and live audio, such as keyboards and vocals, in a single Patch
ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ Switch between Patches without stopping sound output or cutting off held notes
ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ Design rich keyboard Patches using splits and layers, the Arpeggiator, and other MIDI plug-ins
ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ Perform with stereo or multitrack backing tracks using Playback
ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ 64-bit architecture uses all the RAM in your system for larger sampled instruments

ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ Manage sophisticated rigs using the Assignments & Mapping overview

Designed for the Stage
ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ See only what you need during your performance using a customizable, full-screen live interface
ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ Smart Controls offer dynamic performance controls that change with each Patch

ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ Play faithful models of vintage keyboards with Vintage B3, Vintage Electric Piano, and Vintage Clav
ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ Perform inspired sounds using a collection of synths that provide analog, wavetable, FM, and physical modeling synthesis
ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ Play or create a wide variety of rich sampled instruments with the EXS24 Sampler

MIDI Plug-ins

Creative and Production Effects

Guitar and Bass Gear
ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ³ Build your own guitar or bass rig with Amp Designer using vintage and modern amps, cabinets, and mics

Minimum System Requirements

4GB of RAM
Display with 1280-by-768 resolution or higher
OS X v10.8.4 or later
Requires 64-bit Audio Units plug-ins
Minimum 5GB of disk space (35GB of optional content available via in-app download)
